document.title: New Jersey Student Learning Standards - World Languages 2020

E2A5C4C30E15454D8A0EF9C9B72B43E9.description: • 7.1.NL.PRSNT.4: State the names of a few memorized and practiced words and phrases related to climate change in the target culture(s) and in students’ own cultures

9AF63DCAABA844A4AE46FF2086DEA566.description: • 7.1.NL.PRSNT.3: Imitate a few culturally authentic gestures when greeting others and during leave takings.

B93E8C653206438CB6E70A936E6A7172.description: •7.1.NL.PRSNT.2: Express a few basic preferences and/or feelings using memorized words and phrases that are supported by gestures or visuals.

3FD5093507E14EECA5DE607A200A6CC4.description:
• 7.1.NL.PRSNT.1: Present very familiar personal information using memorized words
and phrases that have been repeatedly practiced, often using gestures and visuals to
support communication.

F2FA1DCCE80A4D81813B1039A3B2E328.description: Novice Low learners express basic information about themselves using memorized words and phrases, with the help of gestures or visuals.

D117BE8B524940B2964F6A5A3EB20562.description: 7.1.NL.IPERS.6: Share with others the names of a few memorized and practiced words and phrases related to climate change in the target culture(s) and in students’ own cultures.

5126B20DC1A34EAC9CA6E9D666C60A7D.description: 7.1.NL.IPERS.5: Enact a few culturally authentic gestures when greeting others and during leave takings. •

32667FC83127489196871FCA7D3996C9.description: 7.1.NL.IPERS.4: React to a few procedural instructions, directions, and commands in classroom situations.

8DBC87A6C3B940E9823088FB889656EA.description: 7.1.NL.IPERS.3: Tell others a few basic preferences and/or feelings using memorized words and phrases, often supported by gestures or visuals. •

D08DCA5DC48E4E4DAD2661092B872B09.description: 7.1.NL.IPERS.2: With the help of gestures and/or visuals, share with others basic needs on very familiar topics using memorized words and phrases that have been repeatedly practiced. •

C35584FD554B4FB3BC692EF413991CBC.description:
7.1.NL.IPERS.1: Respond to a few simple questions on very familiar topics using
memorized words and phrases that have been repeatedly practiced.
• •

FB47A30AEFD6440480E4FE298E15BB80.description: Novice Low learners communicate using practiced and memorized words and phrases. They answer some formulaic questions on very familiar topics and express personal needs with memorized words and phrases. Novice Low learners often use gestures and pictures to convey meaning.

8755FDBFE4D243F593A70C5AE10DA731.description:
Recognize a few memorized words related to weather and climate in
the target culture(s) and in students’ own cultures in highly contextualized oral texts.

AE88EE1D68334444B90425FF00B2ECA4.description:
Recognize a few common gestures associated with the target
culture(s).

2AB72B99018440CE9B3A8E64465F3A5E.description:
Respond with physical actions and/or gestures to simple oral
directions, commands, and requests

CDED8C09BC104EA8AEAFA2A10BFD0D02.description:
Identify a few memorized and practiced words contained in oral,
viewed, and written chunks of language in culturally authentic materials when supported
by visual cues such as pictures and gestures and text support such as bolded words,
bulleted lists, and/or captions.

1B05FFF6DC584DB5A6FB4D3BADED01AC.description:
Novice Low learners identify a limited number of memorized or familiar words, symbols, or characters in very familiar contexts when they are
supported by visuals in informational and fictional texts.
